sources.title: Three Blind Mice (1938)
sources.description: Three sisters take their small inheritance and move from Kansas to California in search of rich husbands. To start with Pamela poses as a socialite and Moira and Elizabeth pretend to be her staff. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/three-blind-mice-1938/

metadata.Plot: Three sisters take their small inheritance and move from Kansas to California in search of rich husbands. To start with Pamela poses as a socialite and Moira and Elizabeth pretend to be her staff.
metadata.Writer: Brown Holmes, Lynn Starling, Stephen Powys
metadata.Actors: Loretta Young, Joel McCrea, David Niven
